availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: H. P. Bozorth (Grayson County, Kentucky, sheriff)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Mary H. Bozorth. Father of Mary E. Bozorth, Elizabeth J. Bozorth, Sarah E. Bozorth, William L. Bozorth, Eli L. Bozorth, Perry T. Bozorth, Phebia Bozorth, Cordelia C. Bozorth, and Artelia Bozorth. Farmer in Sangamon County, Illinois, in 1850. Sheriff of Grayson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Sangamon, p. 2. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 13. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Haynes, p. 3. Find A Grave, "Higginson Perry Bozorth (1819-1895)," Memorial #19583009, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19583009&ref=acom (accessed June 23, 2017).
